name: Super soul wipeout
description:
The old forest was corrupted by an evil aura concentrated on a forgotten graveyard. Anyone who dares to enter it gets lost and gradually loses their soul. A brave warrior was sent by the king to purge the filth of that forest. In order to navigate in the damned darkness of the forest, he was equipped with a holy lantern that is able to incinerate the evil in its fire and pick up the remnants of it to cure the lantern’s owner.

Features

  • You soul constantly draining
  • Arcade top-down shooter gameplay
  •  Upgrades that cost just a tiny shard of your soul

Authors

  • Korteh (@superkorteh) Gamedesign, graphics, level design
  • Omicron (@OmicronPerson) Design, code, animtion
  • Elysian Tunes (@elysian_tunes): Music
